    • Constructor Detail

      • Circle

        public Circle​(double r)
       throws BadSize
        Constructs Equaliteral Circle object with given size. Default Position of Circle is (0,0). As Default Circle will be filled. As there is no rotating.
        Parameters:
        l - is length.
        Throws:
        BadSize - is thrown, when zero or negative value is given for size parameters.

      • Circle

        public Circle​(double l,
              double posx,
              double posy)
       throws BadSize
        Constructs Circle object with given sizes.
        Parameters:
        l - is width.
        posx - is x coordinate.
        posy - is y coordinate.
        Throws:
        BadSize - is thrown when zero or negative value is given for size parameters.

        Returns:
